mapper.select: SELECT id, language_id as languageId, problem_info_id as problemInfoId, skeleton_code as skeletonCode, main_code as mainCode FROM problem WHERE id=#{id }
SELECT id, language_id as languageId, problem_info_id as problemInfoId, skeleton_code as skeletonCode, main_code as mainCode FROM problem WHERE problem_info_id=#{problemInfoId }
